Class oracle.html.TableDataCell 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.TableCell
                   |
                   +----oracle.html.TableDataCell
public class TableDataCell
extends TableCell
Description:

TableDataCell encapsulates a TD (table data cell) element

Instructions:

Use this class whenever you want to construct a TD element within a DynamicTable.

Example: 

// Create a TableDataCell with a simple string as content
TableDataCell cell = new TableDataCell("Simple Cell");

See Also:
TableCell, TableHeaderCell, DynamicTable

rowSpan_

Converts content of this object to Regular String
(Assumption) Cell contains only Strings as content

rowSpan_ 
  protected int rowSpan_

TableDataCell 
  public TableDataCell(int valign,
                       int halign,
                       int rowspan,
                       int colspan,
                       boolean nowrap,
                       IHtmlItem content)
Creates a TableDataCell Object
Parameters:
valign - Vertical Alignment
halign - Horizontal Alignment
rowspan - Number of rows spanned by cell
colspan - Number of columns spanned by cell
nowrap - Specifies whether to suppress word wrap in TH or TD cell
content - Content of this cell

Creates an empty TableDataCell Object
